title: SENSING DEATH
description:
There are many different senses we use to experience life and the world beyond. Those feelings can bring us joy or total terror. When you know deep down something is wrong, trust those instincts and run, before it's too late.

First, the beat of a deadly drum
Followed by a child's murderous cry
Then, killer shadows in the water
Finally in our featured story, attraction overrules primal fear

Worry less and feel happier. Sign up for your trial at noom.com/SCARY
Take your FREE in-depth hair consultation and get 15% off your first order at prose.com/SCARY
Download Best Fiends today for FREE on the App Store or Google Play
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
